name: Meow (Bohrium)
description:
This game was made for the Unreal Engine 2016 January game jam. The theme was "Don't push the button!"

You're a cat, but your owner forgot to feed you in a hurry, so you have to press all the buttons to make lots of noise to remind your owner who the boss is.

Controls: Mouse to look around, WASD to move, Spacebar to jump and left mouse button to trigger any buttons while looking at them.

This is an old project reuploaded to itch.io to have all my game jam games conveniently in one place. There are no plans to continue development.
